text: The Governor of Nevada is the chief magistrate of the U.S. state of Nevada,NV Const. art. V, § 1. the head of the executive department of Nevada's state government and the commander-in-chief of the state's military forces.NV Const. art. V, § 5. The current governor is Republican Joe Lombardo, who took office on January 2, 2023. ==List of governors== Prior to becoming a territory, parts of Nevada were part of Utah Territory and New Mexico Territory; see List of governors of Utah and List of governors of New Mexico.
